name: Monsters & Magic
overview: You have been sent to break the power of the evil Dungeon Lord. On your shoulders rests the fate of all your people. If you fail, they will fall under the thrall of the Dungeon Lord forever; you are their last and only hope. Once the game is in progress, you will have to search the passages and chambers of the dungeon until you have overcome all the monsters in the maze before meeting the Dungeon Lord in the final battle to the death.
